TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi XmlSchemaComplexType extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType

summary.span: 按 WWW 联合会 (W3C) 指定的方式显示 来自 XML 架构的元素。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 此类定义一个复杂类型，它确定属性集和元素的内容。

span.span: This class defines a complex type that determines the set of attributes and content of an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类型属性，它是指声明元素`complexType`定义结构、 内容和属性，该元素的元素。An element can be declared with a type attribute that refers to a `complexType` element that defines the structure, content, and attributes of that element. ## Examples 下面的示例创建`complexType`元素。The following example creates a `complexType` element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/CPP/complextype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/CS/complextype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/VB/complextype.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件用于前面的代码示例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

The component of the complex type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性不为 null，复杂类型可以包含来自命名空间中指定的任何属性。If this property is not null, the complex type can contain any attributes from the namespaces specified in the .

Contains and classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeUses As XmlSchemaObjectTable
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaObjectTable ^ AttributeUses { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaObjectTable ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该复杂类型及其基类型的所有已编译属性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of all the complied attributes of this complex type and its base types.

value.span: 来自该复杂类型及其基类型的所有属性的集合。

span.span: The collection of all the attributes from this complex type and its base types.
The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如中的所有属性的组合`Attributes`从层次结构中每个类型的属性。For example, a combination of all the attributes from the `Attributes` property from each type in the hierarchy. 此属性的值是只读的。The value of this property is read-only. 已成功编译该架构来确定允许在实例文档中使用的完整属性集后，此属性具有的值。This property has the value after the schema has been successfully compiled to determine the complete attribute set that is allowed in an instance document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeWildcard As XmlSchemaAnyAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取该复杂类型及其基类型的 的编译后值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for for this complex type and its base type(s).
The post-compilation value of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值是只读的。The value of this property is read-only. 已成功编译该架构来确定复杂类型的完整属性集后，此属性具有值。This property has values after the schema has been successfully compiled to determine the complete attribute set of the complex type. 例如，它可能是`anyAttribute`从其中一个基类型的元素。For example, it might be the `anyAttribute` element from one of the base types.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod Block { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute.

value.span: 特性禁止在指定的派生类型中使用复杂类型。

span.span: The attribute prevents a complex type from being used in the specified type of derivation.
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示派生的类型。Indicates the type of derivation. 此属性可以包含以下值：This attribute can contain the following values: |EnumEnum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用定义的派生限制`BlockDefault`架构，如果它存在的属性。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Extension`|此元素不能被替换为通过扩展派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能被替换为通过限制派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 此元素不能被替换为任何类型而不考虑派生方法。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| `Substitution`， `List`，和`Union`派生方法不支持此属性。The `Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not supported by this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlockResolved As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 在已将类型编译为架构验证后信息集 (infoset) 之后获取值。

span.span: Gets the value after the type has been compiled to the post-schema-validation information set (infoset).

summary.span: 该值指示在实例文档中使用 时如何强制类型。

span.span: This value indicates how the type is enforced when is used in the instance document.

value.span: 架构验证后信息 infoset 值。

span.span: The post-schema-validated infoset value.

value.span: 默认为 元素中的 值。

span.span: The default is value on the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此值从类型本身，或如果未在类型级别定义，则来自`schema`元素。This value is taken either from the type itself or, if not defined at the type level, it is taken from the `schema` element. 例如，如果限制了该值，则可以使用专门定义的类型，不是类型派生自专门定义的类型。For example, if the value is restricted, only the specifically defined type can be used, not types derived from the specifically defined type. 此属性可以包含以下值：This attribute can contain the following values: |EnumEnum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用定义的派生限制`BlockDefault`架构，如果它存在的属性。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Extension`|此元素不能被替换为通过扩展派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|此元素不能被替换为通过限制派生类型。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 此元素不能被替换为任何类型而不考虑派生方法。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| `Substitution`， `List`，和`Union`派生方法不支持此属性。The `Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not supported by this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置该复杂类型的编译后 。

span.span: Gets or sets the post-compilation of this complex type.

value.span: 内容模型类型，它是 或 类之一。

span.span: The content model type that is one of the or classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是与互斥属性。This is mutually exclusive with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As XmlSchemaContentType
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaContentType ContentType { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaContentType get(); };

summary.span: 获取复杂类型的内容模型，它保存编译后值。

span.span: Gets the content model of the complex type which holds the post-compilation value.

value.span: 复杂类型的内容模型的编译后值。

span.span: The post-compilation value of the content model for the complex type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是中的架构验证后信息集的内容。This is the content in the post-schema-validation infoset. 如果`IsMixed`属性设置为`true`上`ContentModel`具有类型的属性`XmlSchemaComplexContent`，返回的值为`Mixed`。If the `IsMixed` property is set to `true` on the `ContentModel` property that has the type `XmlSchemaComplexContent`, the value returned is `Mixed`. 如果`IsMixed`属性是`false`，则值为`Empty`或`ElementOnly`。If the `IsMixed` property is `false`, the value is either `Empty` or `ElementOnly`. 如果在类型`ContentModel`属性具有类型`XmlSchemaSimpleContent`，则此值始终为`TextOnly`。If the type on the `ContentModel` property has the type `XmlSchemaSimpleContent`, then this value is always `TextOnly`. `ContentType`属性必须具有下表中显示的值之一。The `ContentType` property must have one of the values shown in the following table. |EnumEnum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`TextOnly`|纯文本内容。Text-only content.| |`Empty`|空内容。Empty content.| |`ElementOnly`|纯元素内容。Element-only content.| |`Mixed`|混合内容模型。Mixed content model.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentTypeParticle As XmlSchemaParticle
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ ContentTypeParticle { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取保存 粒子的编译后值的粒子。

span.span: Gets the particle that holds the post-compilation value of the particle.
The particle for the content type.
The post-compilation value of the particle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ContentTypeParticle`之后的派生程度最高的类型和基复杂类型的内容模型已得到了解决根据 W3C XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 规范中定义的规则确定。This `ContentTypeParticle` is determined after the content models of the most derived types and the base complex type have been resolved according to the rules defined in the W3C XML Schema definition language (XSD) specification.

summary.span: 获取或设置信息，该信息确定是否可在实例文档中使用 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the information that determines if the element can be used in the instance document.

value.span: 如果为 ，则元素不可以直接使用该 元素，而是必须使用从该 元素中派生的复杂类型。

span.span: If , an element cannot use this element directly and must use a complex type that is derived from this element.
The default is .
Optional.

summary.span: 获取或设置确定复杂类型是否具有混合内容模型（内容中的标记）的相关信息。

span.span: Gets or sets information that determines if the complex type has a mixed content model (markup within the content).

value.span: 如果字符数据可以出现在此复杂类型的子元素之间，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if character data can appear between child elements of this complex type; otherwise, .
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示是否字符数据可以出现在此子元素之间`complexType`。Indicates if character data can appear between the child elements of this `complexType`. 如果`simpleContent`元素是子元素，而`mixed`不允许使用特性 (`false`)。If the `simpleContent` element is a child element, the `mixed` attribute is not allowed (`false`). 如果`complexContent`元素是子元素，而`mixed`属性可以通过重写`mixed`特性，可以在`complexContent`元素。If the `complexContent` element is a child element, the `mixed` attribute can be overridden by the `mixed` attribute on the `complexContent` element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ Particle { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取组合类型或将其设置为 、、 或 类之一。

span.span: Gets or sets the compositor type as one of the , , , or classes.
The compositor type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 粒子必须是以下排序器之一：Particles must be one of the following compositors: |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`group`|该复杂类型包含在引用组中定义的元素。The complex type contains the elements defined in the referenced group.| |`sequence`|该复杂类型包含在指定序列中定义的元素。The complex type contains the elements defined in the specified sequence.| |`choice`|该复杂类型允许的一个元素中指定`choice`元素。The complex type allows one of the elements specified in the `choice` element.| |`all`|该复杂类型允许的所有元素中指定`all`元素一次或根本不出现。The complex type allows all of the elements specified in the `all` element to appear once or not at all.| 这是与互斥属性。This is mutually exclusive with the property.
